mathml

When a≠0 , there are two solutions to ax2 + bx + c = 0 and they are x = − b ± b2 − 4ac 2a .

asciimath

When `a != 0`, there are two solutions to `ax^2 + bx + c = 0` and they are

`x = (-b +- sqrt(b^2-4ac))/(2a) .`
